translation.en: I will never do it again, I promise.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure when the drugs wear off,
translation.de: Wenn die Wirkung der Medikamente nachlässt,

translation.en: [crying] But I'm just so happy to have you here.

translation.en: Always. Always.
All right, Marie. I can see the head.

translation.en: Just give me one more push.
-Okay. Okay. -Ready? Come on, we'll breathe.
One, two, three.
[Russell] I watch a lot of Murder, She Wrote on this new iPad.

translation.en: -Hey, Douglas. -It's like having a TV in your pocket.
Babies, be careful!
Now, you know there's avocado in that nine-month layer dip.

translation.en: -I knew it. I knew it. -[spitting]
-[retches] -That is just nasty. What the hell?
Gross.
And why the hell is there nine layers in a dip?

translation.en: Everybody know dip only supposed to have seven layers.

translation.en: [Dawn] True.
-After that, you just repeating. -Worse than being waterboarded.

translation.en: That's white people dip.
Now, Ethan, hush your mouth. You know these negroes are bougie.

translation.en: And Russell, you be careful. It makes you colic-y.
translation.de: Russell, pass auf, davon kriegst du eine Kolik.

translation.en: -[Dawn] Eww. -Okay, Mom.
[Dawn] Why you wearing corduroy?
-You make my balls stink. -[Russell] Stop, Dawn.

translation.en: -I want to play Candy Land. -Welcome to Wakanda!
translation.de: -Ich kann Fotos machen. -Ich will Candy Land spielen. Willkommen in Wakanda!

translation.en: [stammers] Uh, baby, I think I should do somethin' about the dip.

translation.en: Who doesn't like avocado?
Oh, that's a family trait.
translation.de: Oh, das ist eine Eigenart der Familie.

translation.en: [chuckles] That's right, baby.
I'll help you, Mom.
-Want to take her? -Yeah.
-She's all yours. -I got her.
[Ethan] Hey, where the Domino's at?
What kind of black barbecue ain't got no damn Domino's?

translation.en: Looks like I brought a little bit more to the table than you thought, huh?

translation.en: Well, a couple of 'em look like they should be in jail.
translation.de: Einige sehen aus, als sollten sie im Knast sein.

translation.en: -Hey, man! -Candy Land! Yes, let's do this!
Should be? A couple of them have been.

translation.en: But you know what? That's my family.
translation.de: Aber weißt du was? Das ist meine Familie.

translation.en: And I'm gonna teach this little girl to love her family unconditionally.
translation.de: Und ich werde ihr beibringen, ihre Familie bedingungslos zu lieben.

translation.en: Bro, I just want to thank you from the bottom of my heart
translation.de: Bruder, ich möchte dir von ganzem Herzen danken für das,

translation.en: for what you did for this family.
translation.de: was du für die Familie getan hast.

translation.en: -You gonna be an amazing daddy. -Thank you.
Even though our father wasn't shit.

translation.en: Aw, thanks, Dawn. That was almost emotional.
translation.de: Danke, Dawn. Das war fast emotional.

translation.en: Now, as for you, Uncle Ben.
translation.de: Und was dich betrifft, Onkel Ben,

translation.en: Let me tell you somethin'. I don't care what kind of judge you are,

translation.en: Judge Judy, Judge Reinhold,
Ashley Judge, it don't make no difference to me.
translation.de: Ashley Judge, das ist mir egal.

translation.en: Don't be throwin' shade at my brother, okay?
'Cause I don't mind goin' to jail.

translation.en: -I like jail. -Uh, easy there, easy now.

translation.en: For life, bro.
For life.
-For life, sis. -That's how we do.
-Look at me. I'm watchin' you. -[grunts]

translation.de: Ich glaube, sie hat mir gerade gedroht.

translation.en: Oh, that sounded more like a promise.

translation.en: [chuckles] You want me to tell her back off?
Well, if you would be so kind. I mean...
translation.de: Wenn du so nett wärst. Ich meine...

translation.en: Are you askin' me for a favor?
-Uh... what? -You know, 'cause it sounded like a favor.
Oh, no. Just... just a gesture, a kind gesture on your part.
translation.de: Oh nein. Nur eine nette Geste.

translation.en: Well, if you're askin' me for a favor, I'd like to hear it.
translation.de: Wenn es ein Gefallen ist, möchte ich das hören.

translation.en: As a favor to me, would you ask her to back off, Alan?
translation.de: Tust du mir den Gefallen, sie zurückhalten?

translation.en: I got you.
Hey, Alan! Quick, come here!
Baby Pete wants to say "hi" to his niece.
translation.de: Baby Pete will seine Nichte begrüßen..

translation.en: And you could say "hi" to your kidney.
translation.de: Du könntest auch deine Niere begrüßen.

translation.en: Come on, bring that little nappyhead baby on over here!
translation.de: Los, bring das kleine Afro-Look-Baby her!

translation.en: Oh, leave that baby alone.
-All right, I'm comin', I'm comin'! -Wait, wait, let me... Let me hold her.

translation.en: -Give my regards to Peter. -Hi, Pee-pee!
Hey, Pee-pee.
Aw, man, she got my face.
translation.de: Oh, Mann, sie hat mein Gesicht.

translation.en: Yeah, and your height.
Are you drinking with my kidney?
Oh, get over it, Alan. You ain't gettin' it back!

translation.en: I'mma take it back.
Oh, you got to find me first!

translation.en: I know exactly where he's at. His coordinates are right here.

translation.en: I've a drone in the area. Want me to send in a strike?

translation.en: -I will, I could do it. -Hey, Mama.
translation.de: Ich könnte es tun. Hey, Mama.

translation.en: Oh, my Lord.
Is that my Baby Pete?
Got all my babies together at the same time?

translation.en: Oh, Lord heard my prayer. [sniffles]

translation.en: I went to church Sunday through Wednesday for this moment.
translation.de: Dafür bin ich sonntags bis mittwochs zur Kirche gegangen.

translation.en: [all] Mama! Mama!
Mama's good now. Mama's good. I'm just overwhelmed with emotion.

translation.en: If she dies, I get the jewelry.

translation.en: She's just feelin' the spirit of the Lord.

translation.en: I'm gettin' emotional here. [sniffles]
Family photo time, y'all!
If it's not on the 'Gram, it's a scam!

translation.en: Now, come on, babies. Come on.
Ow! Thank you.
What'd you hit me for?

Russell, Russell, pay attention.

You shut up.
